goals__remit: Fundación Mundo Bipolar is a national wide non profit organization that works for improve the lives of people with mental health problems and defends their rights. We are focused on training and advocay.
relevant_communication:
Partner of Horizon2020 Project: RECOVER-e, In Joint Action in Mental Health and Well Beign was member of WP5 and collaborated in it´s development. 
Board Member of Mental Health Europe, Deputy Chair of ENUSP European Network of (-Ex) Users and Survivors of Psychiatry. Member of the Women Committee of European Disability Forum
